1.2.2.1. Bulk Properties¶

1.2.2.1.1. Bulk Electrical Properties¶

This module contains classes of bulk electrical properties, i.e. resistivity

1.2.2.1.2. Bulk Thermal Properties¶

This module contains properties of thermal interfaces, i.e. thermal contact resistance
